mapper.select: select e.idx, e.nickname, e.title, e.content, to_char(e.w_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as w_date, e.b_code, label, u_idx, c.b_idx, to_char(c.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(c.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date, c.s_idx from board_${url} e join calendar_${url} c on c.idx = e.idx

select idx, nickname, title, content, w_date, b_code, label, u_idx, b_idx, start_date, end_date, a.s_idx, s_name from (select b.idx, nickname, title, content, w_date, b_code, label, u_idx, b_idx, start_date, end_date, s_idx from board_${url} b join calendar_${url} c on b.idx = c.idx where title = #{title}) a join status_${url} s on a.s_idx = s.s_idx
mapper.insert: insert all into board_${url} (idx, nickname, title, content, b_code, label, u_idx) values (board_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, '${nickname}', '${title}', '${content}', ${b_code}, '${label}', ${u_idx}) into board_status_${url} (idx, s_idx) values (board_idx_seq_${url}.currval, ${s_idx}) into calendar_${url} (b_idx, start_date, end_date, idx, s_idx) values (calendar_b_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, to_date('${start_date}', 'YY/MM/DD'), to_date('${end_date}', 'YY/MM/DD'), board_idx_seq_${url}.CURRVAL, ${s_idx}) select * from dual
